name: bomb suit
description: A thick and bulky armored suit used by EOD operators during bomb disposals. It offers excellent protection against evironmental dangers and ballistics, but is very cumbersome and hot to wear. It also lacks any gloves, leaving your hands exposed.

name: skimpy one-piece string swimsuit
description: A women's one-piece 'swimsuit' that consists of skintight string and miniscule patches of ruffled blue and white striped cloth, barely covering anything private.

name: tactical eyepatch
description: A large strip of neoprene meant to be wrapped around the head, covering one eye and then some. Inserted on the inside is a small crystal screen, streaming constant footage from the ultra HD bite-sized camera on the outer side of the eyepatch. Does not bring vision to a blind eye.
